item.title: SQL Unit Testing Using tSQLt: Part 1
item.description:
Unit…what now?

Other practitioners of code-slinging, such as .NET folks, have been unit testing their code for many moons now. We SQL folks, however, rarely seem to do this, at least in my experience.

Several job roles ago, I had to use unit testing on a daily basis. It was heavily integrated into our workflow via the CI/CD pipelines we used
